entities.name: dungbombs
entities.description: Dungbombs are mentioned as a lie in the conversation between Hermione and others. The text states that 'it seemed such a stupid lie', indicating that dungbombs were considered to be an implausible or unbelievable concept.

relationships.description: Dungbombs are described as a type of lie, indicating that they are a specific instance or example of a lie. The text states 'it seemed such a stupid lie', where dungbombs is the object of the verb 'seemed'.
